txt.en: Uruk-hai, dwelling beneath the Towers of the Teeth, could prove a mighty foe if left unchecked.\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>Warning: This quest has a one hour time-limit. The timer will begin upon accepting the quest.</rgb>
'You have succeeded, have you? Good. I do not think we acted a moment too soon.'
Candúr has asked you investigate The Towers of the Teeth and find a way to discourage the invaders from remaining there.

'The time is right to strike those who dwell within Carchost and Narchost. Their leader, the Uruk they call Gúrthrokh, was seen entering the base of Carchost. It can only mean that some serious business is afoot. We must defeat him quickly.'\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>Warning: This quest has a one hour time limit. The timer will begin upon accepting the quest.</rgb>
You should return to Candúr and apprise him of your efforts.
Towers of the Teeth: Guardian of the Teeth
